leadText.title: Examination of the application for compliance with the documentation requirements (223-FZ, 44-FZ)

crumbs.text: Examination of the application for compliance with the documentation requirements

items.title: Examination of your tender application under 44-FZ and 223-FZ
items.text: Request an audit of the application to eliminate the risk of its rejection on formal grounds

five.title: The audit of your application is carried out according to the following criteria:

items.text: Compliance with the rules of documents execution
Correctness of filling out the forms
Completeness of the set of documents
Compliance of the application with qualification and technical requirements

bannerText.title: The application is subject to two-factor verification.
text:
First, it is checked by two experts of the TEK-Torg partner company independently of each other. The result of their work is confirmed by the Controller and only then, after coordination with all specialists, you receive the final report.
In other words, the work is not completed until your application examination goes through all the links in the technological chain. After verification, you will be provided with a detailed report reflecting the identified inconsistencies and possible risks of deviation.

benefits.title: Why is it better to contact the professionals?

cardLink.title: Independent examination gives an objective assessment of the quality of your application application and minimizes the risks of its rejection on formal grounds

cardBottom.title: 70% of applications rejections to non-compliance with the formal requirements of the procurement documentation
15% of failed purchases occur due to non-compliance with the formal requirements of the procurement documentation

sideCard.title: Specialists on tenders will promptly check your application according to several criteria

content.text: Correctness of execution of all required documents
Completeness of filling out the forms
Control of the provision of all necessary and up-to-date supporting documents (title and financial documents, licenses, extracts, references, etc.)
Correction and alignment of your application with the documentation requirements

tariffs.title: Do you want to get a response on the day of submission? Request an express examination of the application
Request an audit of one application
tariffs.description: Will be ready on the second day

textCard.title: Are you planning to participate in biddings for the sale of government, seized and bankrupt property?
text: Specialists will prepare a full set of documents required for participation in the procedure in accordance with the documentation requirements
Specialists/Also, they will provide all necessary information and methodological support at any stage of application preparation

modal.title: Request an examination on property bidding

items.title: You are just starting to participate in biddings?
items.description: You will need the digital signature and registration on the electronic platform. We will help you to choose and obtain a DS which will fully meet your needs. We will register you in the UIS. We will get you accredited in commercial sections – Rosneft, Inter RAO and others

items.title: Do you want to find orders (tenders) on your own?
items.description: Use an intelligent purchase search system – from simple and quick queries to expert selection of closed tenders and competitive market analysis.
